description.en: Attacks the enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.
description.kr: 적을 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
description.jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
description.zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

description.en: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description.kr: 적 전체를 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상에게 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
description.jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
description.zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对目标造成无法解除的<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

description.en: Attacks all enemies and detonates all <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> effects on the targets. Damage from the detonation increases by <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>.
description.kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 대상의 화상을 모두 폭발시키며, 폭발에 의한 피해는 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 증가합니다.
description.jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。対象に付与された火傷をすべて破裂させ、破裂のダメージが<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>UPする。
description.zh: 攻击全体敌人。使目标的所有烧伤爆发,因爆发造成的伤害提升<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>。

description.en: (Passive Effect)\nAlways gains <color=#28d9ed>Buff Enhancement</color>. This effect is irremovable.\nWeakness Gauge cannot be reduced by enemies with Burned.
description.kr: (패시브 효과)\n항상 <color=#28d9ed>강화 촉진</color>을 얻습니다. 이 효과는 해제되지 않습니다.\n화상을 보유한 적에게는 WG가 감소하지 않습니다.
description.jp: (パッシブ効果)\n<color=#28d9ed>強化促進</color>を付与する。この効果は解除されない。\n火傷状態の敵はWGがDOWNしない。
description.zh: (被动效果)\n始终获得<color=#28d9ed>强化促进</color>效果。该效果不会被解除。\n对附带烧伤的敌人不会造成WG降低效果。

description.en:
Becomes <color=#28d9ed>Enraged</color> when Health drops to <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> of Max Health or lower. 

<color=#28d9ed>Enraged</color>: Attacks all enemies.
After becoming Enraged, permanently increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> and reduces <color=#28d9ed>damage taken</color>.
description.kr:
최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 이하가 되면 <color=#28d9ed>광폭화</color> 상태로 전환합니다. 

<color=#28d9ed>광폭화</color> : 적 전체를 공격합니다. 
광폭화 이후 영구적으로 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 증가하고 <color=#28d9ed>받는 피해</color>가 감소합니다.
description.jp:
最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>以下になると<color=#28d9ed>【狂暴化】</color>状態に切り替わる。

<color=#28d9ed>【狂暴化】</color>:敵全体にダメージを与える。狂暴化後、永続的に
攻撃力<color=#28d9ed>と</color>スピード<color=#28d9ed>がUPし、</color>受けるダメージ<color=#28d9ed>がDOWNする</color>。
description.zh:
若生命值降至上限的<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>以下,则转换为<color=#28d9ed>狂暴化</color>状态。

<color=#28d9ed>狂暴化</color>:攻击全体敌人。
狂暴化后永久获得<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>和<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>提升,并使<color=#28d9ed>所受伤害</color>降低。
